programmes.show_description: A blizzard hits Chicago as Kozenczak finds Gacy's survivors - while he and Kunkle pressure Gacy's aide David Cram, Billy Carroll shows Dale Landingin the risks and rewards of sex work.

programmes.show_name: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
programmes.show_description: Joining Alan at Manor Farm are Hannah Waddingham, Dame Mary Berry, and Michael Praed to provide the chat as we shine a light on the tradition of horse logging.

programmes.show_name: Julia Bradbury's Wonders of the Frozen South
programmes.show_description: Julia Bradbury explores Antarctica’s stunning landscapes and encounters penguins, seals and whales during an emotional journey.
